title: MCP Apps Protocol
description: JSON Schema for MCP Apps UI protocol messages

tools.description: App exposes MCP-style tools that the host can call.

serverTools.description: Host can proxy tool calls to the MCP server.

serverResources.description: Host can proxy resource reads to the MCP server.

sandbox.description: Sandbox configuration applied by the host.

permissions.description: Permissions granted by the host (camera, microphone, geolocation).

clipboardWrite.description: Request clipboard write access (Permission Policy `clipboard-write` feature).

csp.description: CSP domains approved by the host.

resourceDomains.description: Origins for static resources (scripts, images, styles, fonts).

baseUriDomains.description: Allowed base URIs for the document (base-uri directive).

updateModelContext.description: Host accepts context updates (ui/update-model-context) to be included in the model's context for future turns.

resourceLink.description: Host supports resource link content blocks.

message.description: Host supports receiving content messages (ui/message) from the Guest UI.

resourceLink.description: Host supports resource link content blocks.

params.description: Partial context update containing only changed fields.

toolInfo.description: Metadata of the tool call that instantiated this App.

id.description: JSON-RPC id of the tools/call request.

tool.description: Tool definition including name, inputSchema, etc.

styles.description: Style configuration for theming the app.

variables.description: CSS variables for theming the app.

propertyNames.description:
Style variables for theming MCP apps.

Individual style keys are optional - hosts may provide any subset of these values.
Values are strings containing CSS values (colors, sizes, font stacks, etc.).

Note: This type uses `Record<K, string | undefined>` rather than `Partial<Record<K, string>>`
for compatibility with Zod schema generation. Both are functionally equivalent for validation.

additionalProperties.description:
Style variables for theming MCP apps.

Individual style keys are optional - hosts may provide any subset of these values.
Values are strings containing CSS values (colors, sizes, font stacks, etc.).

Note: This type uses `Record<K, string | undefined>` rather than `Partial<Record<K, string>>`
for compatibility with Zod schema generation. Both are functionally equivalent for validation.

css.description: CSS blocks that apps can inject.

fonts.description: CSS for font loading (@font-face rules or

displayMode.description: How the UI is currently displayed.

containerDimensions.description:
Container dimensions. Represents the dimensions of the iframe or other
container holding the app. Specify either width or maxWidth, and either height or maxHeight.

locale.description: User's language and region preference in BCP 47 format.

platform.description: Platform type for responsive design decisions.

touch.description: Whether the device supports touch input.

hover.description: Whether the device supports hover interactions.

safeAreaInsets.description: Mobile safe area boundaries in pixels.

top.description: Top safe area inset in pixels.

right.description: Right safe area inset in pixels.

bottom.description: Bottom safe area inset in pixels.

left.description: Left safe area inset in pixels.

toolInfo.description: Metadata of the tool call that instantiated this App.

id.description: JSON-RPC id of the tools/call request.

tool.description: Tool definition including name, inputSchema, etc.

styles.description: Style configuration for theming the app.

variables.description: CSS variables for theming the app.

Values are strings containing CSS values (colors, sizes, font stacks, etc.).

fonts.description: CSS for font loading (@font-face rules or

appCapabilities.description: Features and capabilities this app provides.

tools.description: App exposes MCP-style tools that the host can call.

hostCapabilities.description: Features and capabilities provided by the host.

serverTools.description: Host can proxy tool calls to the MCP server.

serverResources.description: Host can proxy resource reads to the MCP server.

sandbox.description: Sandbox configuration applied by the host.

permissions.description: Permissions granted by the host (camera, microphone, geolocation).

csp.description: CSP domains approved by the host.

baseUriDomains.description: Allowed base URIs for the document (base-uri directive).

updateModelContext.description: Host accepts context updates (ui/update-model-context) to be included in the model's context for future turns.

resourceLink.description: Host supports resource link content blocks.

message.description: Host supports receiving content messages (ui/message) from the Guest UI.

resourceLink.description: Host supports resource link content blocks.

hostContext.description: Rich context about the host environment.

id.description: JSON-RPC id of the tools/call request.

css.description: CSS blocks that apps can inject.

fonts.description: CSS for font loading (@font-face rules or

Container dimensions. Represents the dimensions of the iframe or other
container holding the app. Specify either width or maxWidth, and either height or maxHeight.

locale.description: User's language and region preference in BCP 47 format.

platform.description: Platform type for responsive design decisions.

touch.description: Whether the device supports touch input.

hover.description: Whether the device supports hover interactions.

safeAreaInsets.description: Mobile safe area boundaries in pixels.

top.description: Top safe area inset in pixels.

right.description: Right safe area inset in pixels.

bottom.description: Bottom safe area inset in pixels.

left.description: Left safe area inset in pixels.

role.description: Message role, currently only "user" is supported.

isError.description: True if the host rejected or failed to deliver the message.

url.description: URL to open in the host's browser

isError.description: True if the host failed to open the URL (e.g., due to security policy).

mode.description: The display mode that was actually set. May differ from requested if not supported.

resourceDomains.description: Origins for static resources (scripts, images, styles, fonts).

baseUriDomains.description: Allowed base URIs for the document (base-uri directive).

resourceDomains.description: Origins for static resources (scripts, images, styles, fonts).

baseUriDomains.description: Allowed base URIs for the document (base-uri directive).

permissions.description: Sandbox permissions requested by the UI.

clipboardWrite.description: Request clipboard write access (Permission Policy `clipboard-write` feature).

prefersBorder.description: Visual boundary preference - true if UI prefers a visible border.

clipboardWrite.description: Request clipboard write access (Permission Policy `clipboard-write` feature).

html.description: HTML content to load into the inner iframe.

sandbox.description: Optional override for the inner iframe's sandbox attribute.

resourceDomains.description: Origins for static resources (scripts, images, styles, fonts).

baseUriDomains.description: Allowed base URIs for the document (base-uri directive).

clipboardWrite.description: Request clipboard write access (Permission Policy `clipboard-write` feature).

McpUiStyleVariableKey.description: CSS variable keys available to MCP apps for theming.

McpUiStyles.description:
Style variables for theming MCP apps.

Individual style keys are optional - hosts may provide any subset of these values.
Values are strings containing CSS values (colors, sizes, font stacks, etc.).

Note: This type uses `Record<K, string | undefined>` rather than `Partial<Record<K, string>>`
for compatibility with Zod schema generation. Both are functionally equivalent for validation.

propertyNames.description:
Style variables for theming MCP apps.

Individual style keys are optional - hosts may provide any subset of these values.
Values are strings containing CSS values (colors, sizes, font stacks, etc.).

Note: This type uses `Record<K, string | undefined>` rather than `Partial<Record<K, string>>`
for compatibility with Zod schema generation. Both are functionally equivalent for validation.

additionalProperties.description:
Style variables for theming MCP apps.

Individual style keys are optional - hosts may provide any subset of these values.

Note: This type uses `Record<K, string | undefined>` rather than `Partial<Record<K, string>>`
for compatibility with Zod schema generation. Both are functionally equivalent for validation.

resourceLink.description: Host supports resource link content blocks.

McpUiTheme.description: Color theme preference for the host environment.

reason.description: Optional reason for the cancellation (e.g., "user action", "timeout").

arguments.description: Complete tool call arguments as key-value pairs.

additionalProperties.description: Complete tool call arguments as key-value pairs.

arguments.description: Partial tool call arguments (incomplete, may change).

additionalProperties.description: Partial tool call arguments (incomplete, may change).

visibility.description:
Who can access this tool. Default: ["model", "app"]
- "model": Tool visible to and callable by the agent
- "app": Tool callable by the app from this server only

items.description: Tool visibility scope - who can access the tool.

McpUiToolVisibility.description: Tool visibility scope - who can access the tool.

structuredContent.description: Structured content for machine-readable context data.

additionalProperties.description: Structured content for machine-readable context data.
